oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Francis Craig's Orchestra - 1937-mm-dd - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM/NBC Blue program Francis Craig's Orchestra, part 1. Unknown broadcast date, performances suggest 1937 as year. Featuring Francis Craig and his Orchestra with Cecil Bailey.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Francis Craig and his Orchestra; Cecil Bailey
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified musical excerpt] -- Blue Hawaii (rehearsal excerpt) -- Let's Call The Whole Thing Off (rehearsal excerpt) -- Theme (Red Rose) (Francis Craig and his Orchestra) -- Opening statement -- [Unidentified orchestral piece] -- Announcer introduces Cecil Bailey -- Let's Call The Whole Thing Off (Cecil Bailey) -- Announcer introduces the next piece -- Easy On The Eyes (Francis Craig and his Orchestra) -- Announcer introduces the next piece -- Got A Need For You (Francis Craig and his Orchestra) -- Announcer introduces the next piece -- Blue Hawaii (Francis Craig and his Orchestra)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); Francis Craig's orchestra (Radio program); Craig, Francis, 1900-1966; Bailey, Cecil (Vocalist)
